author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4270] load plugins with extensions enabled fully (including plugin dependencies) prior to querying them for artifact handlers, just like we do for lifecycles.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4270] completely load any plugin used for extensions, so plugin dependencies can supply artifact handlers and lifecycle mappings, in addition to the plugin artifact itself.

msg: CHUKWA-333. Update release notes from 0.2 branch
